SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Create a Net Zero Cloud Trial Org

Experience hands-on engagement with Net Zero Cloud in a full-featured trial. Trial orgs are intended for proof of concept and guided self-exploration. Trial orgs expire in 30 days.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
IMPORTANT The Net Zero Cloud Prebuilt Apps is a Non-SFDC Application as defined under, and subject to the terms of, your Main Services Agreement (f/k/a the Master Subscription Agreement) with Salesforce.

https://www.salesforce.com/company/legal/agreements.jsp

Go to the Developer Free Trials sign-up page and look for the Net Zero Cloud Free Trials on the Industry-Based Trials tab.

You can also go directly to one of these trial org sign-up pages.

Learning Org

This fully configured org includes rich sample data and lets you see all the Net Zero Cloud features in action. Use these orgs to see what comprehensive enablement looks like.

Pre-Release Org

This org provides a sneak peek at upcoming release features. You can create these orgs only during sandbox preview windows. If the page doesn’t include a sign-up form, the preview window is closed.

Base Org

This unconfigured org is a blank slate with only the necessary licenses and permissions. Use these orgs for quick proof-of-concept projects or general testing.

Enter the required information and click Next.
Read and agree to the main service agreement.
Click Submit.
